short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beautifies the CSES problem tab and adds progress reports

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your CSES problem-solving experience with the CSES Problem Beautifier extension! Designed for competitive programmers, this extension beautifies the entire CSES platform, providing a visually appealing and more intuitive interface. Track your progress effortlessly with interactive charts and tables that display detailed stats of your solved, attempted, and unattempted problems.

Say goodbye to the repetitive hassle of uploading code filesâ€”our extension lets you submit solutions with a simple copy-paste. By reducing stress and boosting motivation, CSES Problem Beautifier is the perfect tool to help you focus on what really matters: solving more problems and improving your skills!
